changes.comment: Add parameter scopes. Parameter scopes allow for behind-the-scenes conflict resolution between parameters with the same long name. For example, when provided scope "my-scope", a parameter can be referenced on the CLI as "--my-parameter" or as "--my-scope:my-parameter". In the case that multiple parameters are registered with the same long name but different scopes, the parameters can only be referenced by their scoped long names, eg. "--my-scope:my-parameter" and "--my-other-scope:my-parameter".
